  • Minimoog
    Moog
    USA, 1970
    The Minimoog is an analog synthesizer invented by Bob Moog in 1970. It is the most famous synthesizer of all time. The Minimoog can be heard on countless records. A variouty of pugin emulations exist...
    $5499
    Analog
    Monophonic
